title: Exquisite Diamond Floral Vaddanam - A Modern Take on Tradition
materials: Hand-selected Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
features: This Vaddanam features a delicate floral motif intricately crafted with pavé-set diamonds, inspired by traditional South Indian designs. The rose gold base enhances the sparkle of the diamonds. The design is modern yet rooted in traditional South Indian artistry. The flexible links allow for comfortable wear.
description: A blend of contemporary design with traditional South Indian influences. The high-quality diamonds and rose gold create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. The floral motif is both elegant and timeless. Perfect for adding a touch of sparkle to your special day. Made with expert craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
